dialogueLines.line: Phew, I'm tired of walking! And I haven't seen any humans at all...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Hey! Hey there zombie! Looks like you're in a rap battle competition!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: ...hmm?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Ah! Human! Got it!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: GYAAA! Don't shove it in my face without question!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: ...? Did you just say I'm a contestant?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Yeah! I saw you running around with a convention flyer!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: ...But the road to the convention center is the opposite direction from here.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: What?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Yes, the venue is that way.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: I stopped you to tell you that you were going the wrong way.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Oh, really? Hahahaha this is a faux pas! Thanks a lot!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: But it's not like I'm a participant!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...What did you say?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: You saw the flyer for the tournament, right? You saw the flyer for the rap battle competition where the winner gets a wish granted? Why don't you participate?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: I'm here to eat all the people in the convention hall! I'm so hungry right now!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...What?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: You guys owe me a favor for showing you the way, so I'll leave you uneaten! Thank you!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Whoa! Wait!!! Wait a minute!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: You, rap battle with me!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: What? What's up with you all of a sudden?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I'm a professional rapper! If you have a heated battle with me, you'll find that rap battles are more fun than eating people!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: (Shit... we have to get this zombie to participate in a rap battle somehow...! We'll lose every single player at the event! That would ruin my plan!)
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Hmmm...well ok!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Well can I eat you when you're done?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily
